data.title: Hours and Locations
data.meta_description: Hours and locations of all DMV facilities.
data.text:
Please note:

Schedule of Holidays the DMV will be closed for business: 2024

Important Notice: Although walk-in services are available for most transactions, please be advised that customers with appointments will be given priority.

Driver Knowledge and Road Tests: Please be advised that Driver License Knowledge and Road Tests, Commercial Driver Licenses (CDL) and motorcycle tests are by appointment only. You may request a test from our Appointments and Services page.

*Please Note: Customers requiring Driving Records are limited to obtaining their own driving record. Second and third party requests must come to Concord.

Map of New Hampshire showing DMV offices.

Locations:

Colebrook | Concord | Concord IRP | Dover | Epping | Gorham | Keene | Manchester | Milford | Nashua | Newport | North Haverhill | Salem | Tamworth | Twin Mountain

Colebrook

Address: 17 Bridge Street (Town Hall)

Days: Limited availability

Services: Driver Licensing appointments only

Driving Directions

Concord

Address: 23 Hazen Drive

Days: 8:00 am - 4:30 pm Monday-Friday

Services: Drop Box; Driver Licensing; Financial Responsibility (ticket payment, driving records, etc.); Registration (vehicle and boat); Walking Disability; Title

Driving Directions

Concord IRP

Address: 23 Hazen Drive

Days: Drop Box; Mail; walk-in drop off

Services: IRP

Services: Drop Box; Driver Licensing; Registration (vehicle and boat); Walking Disability; apply for Duplicate Titles; *Driving Records (please see notation above)
